Articles.Content: I like the I-beam part; it's very useful for constructing just about any ridiculous thing in the game. But what dissapoints me is the lack of versatility: you have the enormous full size version, and the still very large pocket edition. What I would like to see is maybe a quarter sized I beam for further versatility.
That's probably simple enough to be your first mod part. make it while learning how to mod.

That's probably simple enough to be your first mod part. make it while learning how to mod.

I do not know how to mod myself (it's just an area I have never been good at) and I have yet to see something similar made into a mod.
